lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 20 (AP) -- "The British Imperial armies, throwing out successively widening arcs of steel across the bleak Libyan terrain while the Mediterranean Fleet loosed a running storm of fire upon the Axis coastal positions, were declared tonight to be threatening General Erwin Rommel's North African Corps with disastrous envelopment.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
